message.rftoolsutility.analog.header: 類比可以根據兩側輸入對輸入紅石信號進行簡單的"計算"
message.rftoolsutility.counter.header: The Counter can count redstone pulses upto a specified maximum (and when maximum is reached send out a redstone pulse on its own)
message.rftoolsutility.digit.header: The Digit block shows the strength of the input redstone signal
message.rftoolsutility.invchecker.header: The Inventory Checker can check for the presence of items in an inventory and send out a redstone signal
message.rftoolsutility.sensor.header: The Sensor can detect various things like mobs, players, blocks, fluids, and crop growth and send out a redstone signal under some conditions
message.rftoolsutility.sequencer.header: The Sequencer can send out series of redstone pulses given certain input signals. The sequences can optionally be repeated
message.rftoolsutility.logic.header: The Logic block can combine three input signals into one output signal given a truth table
message.rftoolsutility.timer.header: The Timer block can send out timed redstone pulses
message.rftoolsutility.wire.header: The Wire block is a very simple lag-free redstone wire. Can only do straight lines
message.rftoolsutility.tablet_redstone.h: 平板電腦可用於參考遠端GUI和訊息
message.rftoolsutility.tablet_redstone.g: Tablet containing redstone info: right click for redstone gui, sneak right click for tablet gui
message.rftoolsutility.tablet_screen.hea: 平板電腦可用於參考遠端GUI和訊息
message.rftoolsutility.tablet_screen.gol: Tablet containing a screen: right click for screen, sneak right click for tablet gui
message.rftoolsutility.screen_link.heade: This item can be used to refer to a screen in the world and then inserted in the Tablet
message.rftoolsutility.screen_link.gold: 潛行並對著螢幕按下右鍵連結
message.rftoolsutility.redstone_informat: 此模組可以被使用在平版電腦上，可以查看和控制無線紅石訊號
對著紅石發信器或是接收器右鍵使用來為此模組新增一個頻道
message.rftoolsutility.redstone_receiver: 紅石訊號接收器可以遠距離接收紅石訊號 (來自紅石訊號發信器或是按鈕模組)
Right click on a Matter Transmitter or other Redstone Receiver to link
message.rftoolsutility.redstone_transmit: The Redstone Transmitter accepts redstone signals and sends them out wirelessly to linked receivers
Place down to create a channel or else right click on receiver/transmitter to use that channel
message.rftoolsutility.button_module.hea: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕在被按下時會發送紅石訊號
message.rftoolsutility.button_module.gol: 潛行對著紅石訊號接收器右鍵使用來為此模組建立一個頻道並將其連結至該接收器。你也可以對著發送器或是已經設定好的接收器使用來複製其頻道連結到按鈕上
message.rftoolsutility.clock_module.head: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示當前時間
message.rftoolsutility.text_module.heade: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示一些文字
message.rftoolsutility.counter_module.he: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示計數器當前數量
message.rftoolsutility.counter_module.go: 潛行對著計數器右鍵使用來為此計數器模組設定目標
message.rftoolsutility.counterplus_modul: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示計數器當前數量
潛行對著計數器右鍵使用來為此計數器模組設定目標
message.rftoolsutility.energy_module.hea: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示方塊的能量狀態
message.rftoolsutility.energy_module.gol: 潛行對著機器右鍵使用來為此能量模組設定目標
message.rftoolsutility.energyplus_module: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示方塊的能量狀態
潛行對著機器右鍵使用來為此能量模組設定目標
message.rftoolsutility.fluid_module.head: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示蓄罐的儲量
message.rftoolsutility.fluid_module.gold: 潛行對著蓄罐右鍵使用來為此流體模組設定目標
一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示蓄罐的儲量
潛行對著蓄罐右鍵使用來為此流體模組設定目標
一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示儲物容器中4個欄位的狀態
潛行對著儲物容器右鍵使用來為此儲存模組設定目標
message.rftoolsutility.inventoryplus_mod: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示儲物容器中4個欄位的狀態
潛行對著儲物容器右鍵使用來為此儲存模組設定目標
message.rftoolsutility.elevator_button_m: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使你可以透過螢幕控制電梯
潛行對著電梯方塊右鍵使用來為電梯按鈕模組設定目標
message.rftoolsutility.machineinformatio: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使你可以監控機器狀態 (適用支援此系統的機器)
潛行對著受支援的方塊右鍵使用來為機器訊息模組設定目標
message.rftoolsutility.redstone_module.h: 一個用於螢幕的模組，使螢幕顯示紅石頻道的狀態
message.rftoolsutility.redstone_module.g: 潛行對著紅石訊號發信器或接收器右鍵使用來為此模組建立一個頻道。或是潛行對著任意方塊的其中一側右鍵使用來監控方塊該面的紅石訊號輸出
message.rftoolsutility.charged_porter.he: This RF/charged item allows you to teleport to a previously set matter receiver. Sneak-right clickon a receiver to set the destination. Right click to perform the teleport
message.rftoolsutility.advanced_charged_: This RF/charged item allows you to teleport to a previously set matter receiver. Sneak-right clickon a receiver to set the destination. Right click to perform the teleport
message.rftoolsutility.syringe.header: This RF/charged item allows you to teleport to a previously set matter receiver. Sneak-right clickon a receiver to set the destination. Right click to perform the teleport
message.rftoolsutility.dialing_device.he: With the dialing device you can 'dial-up' any nearby matter transmitter to any matter receiver in the Minecraft universe. This requires power. If a Destination Analyzer is adjacent to this block you will also be able to check if the destination has enough power to be safe
message.rftoolsutility.matter_receiver.h: If you place this block anywhere in the world then you can dial to it using a Dialing Device. Before teleporting to this block make sure to give it power!
message.rftoolsutility.matter_transmitte: If you place this block near a Dialing Device then you can dial it to a Matter Receiver. Make sure to give it sufficient power! Use a Destination Analyzer adjacent to this block to check destination status (red is bad, green ok, yellow is unknown). Use a  Matter Booster adjacent to this block to be able to teleport to unpowered receivers
注能獎勵: 降低功耗並增加傳輸速度
message.rftoolsutility.simple_dialer.hea: When this block gets a redstone signal it dials or interrupts a transmitter. Sneak-right click with this block on a transmitter or dialed receiver to set the destination
message.rftoolsutility.matter_beamer.hea: This block converts matter into a beam of energy. It can then send that beam to a connected spawner. Connect by using a wrench
message.rftoolsutility.matter_beamer.gol: 注能獎勵: 減少能量使用、增加速度並減少材料需求
message.rftoolsutility.spawner.header: 這個方塊可以生成生物。它需要放入一個注射器、輸入RF能量和投影帶有物質的光束。
message.rftoolsutility.spawner.gold: 注能獎勵: 減少能量使用
message.rftoolsutility.screen.header: 這是一個模組化螢幕。因此他不顯示任何東西。你必須插入模組來控制你所能看見的內容。這個螢幕不能直接供電，它需要由附近的螢幕控制器來進行遠距供電。
message.rftoolsutility.creative_screen.h: 這是一個模組化螢幕。因此他不顯示任何東西。你必須插入模組來控制你所能看見的內容。這是普通螢幕的創造模式版本，因此它不需要供電。
message.rftoolsutility.screen_controller: 在螢幕可以運作之前，他們需要從控制器那裡獲得能量。即便螢幕只裝有不消耗能量的模組，也同樣需要有控制器。只要有在範圍之內，一個控制器就可以為很多螢幕進行供電
注能獎勵: 增加螢幕範圍
message.rftoolsutility.crafter1.header: 這台機器可以同時處理2種配方，並允許配方使用前次步驟所合成出來產物。
message.rftoolsutility.crafter2.header: 這台機器可以同時處理4種配方，並允許配方使用前次步驟所合成出來產物。
message.rftoolsutility.crafter3.header: 這台機器可以同時處理8種配方，並允許配方使用前次步驟所合成出來產物。
message.rftoolsutility.tank.header: 一個支援流體過濾的蓄罐
rftoolsutility.category.main.description: RFTools Utility is a mod containing various useful blocks and tools
rftoolsutility.category.machines.descrip: All the machines in this mod
rftoolsutility.category.logic.descriptio: Logic Blocks are all about producing redstone signals and reacting to them
rftoolsutility.page.crafter0: The Crafter can be used to automatically craft blocks and items. The top tier version supports up to 8 different recipes$(br2)There are 26 input slots (for ingredients) and 4 output slots
rftoolsutility.page.crafter1: It is possible to $(l)Remember$() the contents of the slots with the R button. That way an input or output slot can only contain that specific item. Use the F button to forget this again$(br2)$(5)Infusing$() this machine reduces the power usage$(br2)The crafter supports the $(l:rftoolsbase:tools/filtermodule)Filter Module$(/l)
rftoolsutility.page.tank0: A container for liquids that can (by default) hold up to 32 buckets. It's possible to restrict the type of liquids by placing a bucket with the specific liquid in the filter slot
rftoolsutility.page.screen0: The Screen is a versatile block that can display all kinds of information. This depends on the modules you have installed. The Screen needs power that is remotely supplied by a nearby $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/screen_controller)Screen Controller$(/l)$(br2)$(5)Right click$() with an empty hand to open the Screen user interface
rftoolsutility.page.screen1: In the GUI you can install modules (or you can install them by right clicking the module on the screen)$(br2)Many modules (like the energy module) need a target to work on. To set that target you must first $(5)sneak right click$() the module on the machine you want to monitor
rftoolsutility.page.screen2: When the module is installed in the Screen there are also various display options that you can set by opening the specific module GUI (accessed through the normal Screen GUI)$(br2)In that GUI you can also enable 'full bright' mode and by using the wrench you can change the size and transparency of the screen
rftoolsutility.page.screen_controller0: With the Screen Controller you can power nearby $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/screen)screens$(/l). Using the 'Scan' button in the GUI you can connect to all screens in a 32x32x32 radius.$(br2)$(5)Infusing$() this machine will increase this range
rftoolsutility.page.screen_link0: Using $(5)right click$() you can link this item to a $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/screen)Screen$(/l) and after that place it in a $(l:tools/tablet)Tablet$(/l). This allows you to look at the Screen from anywhere (provided the Screen is chunkloaded)
rftoolsutility.page.matter_transmitter0: The Matter Transmitter is a device that can teleport players to any other $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/matter_receiver)Matter Receiver$(/l). Use the $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/dialing_device)Dialing Device$(/l) to dial a matter transmitter to a receiver.$(br2)$(5)Infusing$() this machine causes reduced power consumption and increased teleportation speed
rftoolsutility.page.matter_receiver0: The Matter Receiver is where a player can teleport too from a $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/matter_transmitter)Matter Transmitter$(/l). Use the $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/dialing_device)Dialing Device$(/l) to dial a matter transmitter to this receiver.$(br2)$(5)Infusing$() this machine causes reduced power consumption
rftoolsutility.page.matter_receiver1: Note that it is very important that the Matter Receiver has enough power. If not the player risks bad effects when teleporting
rftoolsutility.page.dialing_device0: With the Dialing Device you can link a $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/matter_transmitter)Matter Transmitter$(/l) to a $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/matter_receiver)Matter Receiver$(/l). Note that the Matter Transmitter has to be nearby but the Matter Receiver can be very far away (even in another dimension)$(br2)$(5)Infusing$() this machine reduces power usage
rftoolsutility.page.dialing_device1: To dial you first have to select a Matter Transmitter. If there is only one nearby then it will be automatically selected. After that you have to select a Matter Receiver (in the bottom list) and chose either 'Dial' or 'Dial Once'. With 'Dial Once' the connection will be interrupted as soon as someone teleports
rftoolsutility.page.sequencer0: The Sequencer is a versatile block that can generate specific sequences of redstone signal based on other redstone inputs. It works by selecting 64 different redstone outputs. Whenever a sequence runs it will set the redstone output of this block to this pattern in sequence$(br2)There are 7 different modes:
rftoolsutility.page.sequencer1: $(li)$(d)Once1: $()Cycle once. Ignores signals until done$(/li)$(li)$(d)Once2: $()Cycle once. Restart cycle on new signal$(/li)$(li)$(d)Loop1: $()Continuous loop. Ignore redstone signals$(/li)$(li)$(d)Loop2: $()Continious loop. Signal resets cycle to start$(/li)$(li)$(d)Loop3: $()Continious loop while enabled. Stay at current step if disabled$(/li)$(li)$(d)Loop4: $()Continious loop while enabled. Reset to beginning if disabled$(/li)$(li)$(d)Step: $()Perform one step in the cycle on every signal$(/li)
rftoolsutility.page.timer0: The timer is a simple gate that will repeatedly send a redstone pulse. You can input any value for the delay so it can be used for very long timeouts.
rftoolsutility.page.timer1: What is special about this timer is that it restart when it itself receives a redstone pulse at its input. So given timely input pulses this block will never output a pulse itself. By using this feature this block can be used as a way to detect that a certain activity is overdue.
rftoolsutility.page.counter0: The counter is a simple block that will count redstone pulses and emit a redstone signal when it reaches a certain number. Then it starts over. You can see in the GUI how many redstone pulses it already got.
rftoolsutility.page.logic0: This block has three redstone inputs and one output. Using the GUI you can make any possible combination of those three inputs into a single output. For every input combination you can set the output to off, on or keep. In keep the state of the output will be the same as it was before the input was switched to this state.
rftoolsutility.page.invchecker0: This block checks a slot the inventory adjacent to its input side and emits a redstone signal in case the number of items in that slot is above a certain value (configurable in GUI).
rftoolsutility.page.sensor0: The sensor can detect various things directly in front of its input (either 1 block, 3 blocks or 5 blocks). It can detect blocks being placed, crop growth level, number of entities and so on.
rftoolsutility.page.analog0: The analog can do calculations on an input signal based on the comparison result of the A and B inputs
rftoolsutility.page.redstone_transmitter: This block will wirelessly send out a redstone signal on a specific channel when it gets a redstone signal. Use this in combination with the redstone receiver block. If you place this block down it will create a channel. You can also link this transmitter to existing channels by right clicking on another transmitter or receiver.

Use a $(l:rftoolsutility:logic/redstone_receiver)Redstone Receiver$(/l) to receive redstone signals.$(br2)Using the GUI of this block you can give this channel a name which makes it easier to recognize
rftoolsutility.page.redstone_receiver0: This block will receive a redstone signal from a linked redstone transmitter. To link this receiver with a transmitter right-select the transmitter (or another linked receiver) with this block. Enabling 'analog mode' causes the power level of transmitted signals to be preserved at the receiving end.
rftoolsutility.page.redstone_receiver1: Use a $(l:rftoolsutility:logic/redstone_transmitter)Redstone Transmitter$(/l) or a Button Module in a $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/screen)Screen$(/l) to send redstone signals
rftoolsutility.page.digit0: This block simply displays a number from 0 to F (hexadecimal) corresponding to the strength of the input signal
rftoolsutility.page.redstone_information: This item can store several redstone channels ($(5)right click$() on a $(l:rftoolsutility:logic/redstone_transmitter)Redstone Transmitter$(/l) or $(l:rftoolsutility:logic/redstone_receiver)Redstone Receiver$(/l) to add the channel). You can then put it in a $(l:rftoolsbase:tools/tablet)Tablet$(/l) which allows you to examine and change redstone signals from anywhere
